trans-unit.target: Flash

trans-unit.source: The [**FlashControl**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn297725) allows you to enable or disable the flash or to enable automatic flash, where the system dynamically determines whether to use the flash.
trans-unit.target: The [**FlashControl**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn297725) allows you to enable or disable the flash or to enable automatic flash, where the system dynamically determines whether to use the flash.

trans-unit.target: This control also allows you to enable automatic red eye reduction on devices that support it.

trans-unit.source: These settings all apply to capturing photos.
trans-unit.target: These settings all apply to capturing photos.

trans-unit.target: The [**TorchControl**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn279077) is a separate control for turning the torch on or off for video capture.

trans-unit.source: This example uses a set of radio buttons to allow the user to switch between on, off, and auto flash settings.
trans-unit.target: This example uses a set of radio buttons to allow the user to switch between on, off, and auto flash settings.

trans-unit.source: Focus
trans-unit.target: Focus

trans-unit.source: Three different commonly used methods for adjusting the focus of the camera are supported by the [**FocusControl**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn297788) object, continuous autofocus, tap to focus, and manual focus.
trans-unit.target: Three different commonly used methods for adjusting the focus of the camera are supported by the [**FocusControl**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn297788) object, continuous autofocus, tap to focus, and manual focus.

trans-unit.source: A camera app may support all three of these methods, but for readability, this article discusses each technique separately.
trans-unit.target: A camera app may support all three of these methods, but for readability, this article discusses each technique separately.

trans-unit.source: This section also discusses how to enable the focus assist light.
trans-unit.target: This section also discusses how to enable the focus assist light.

trans-unit.source: Continuous autofocus
trans-unit.target: Continuous autofocus

trans-unit.source: Enabling continuous autofocus instructs the camera to adjust the focus dynamically to try to keep the subject of the photo or video in focus.
trans-unit.target: Enabling continuous autofocus instructs the camera to adjust the focus dynamically to try to keep the subject of the photo or video in focus.

trans-unit.source: This example uses a radio button to toggle continuous autofocus on and off.
trans-unit.target: This example uses a radio button to toggle continuous autofocus on and off.

trans-unit.target: CAFXAML

trans-unit.target: Check to see if the current capture device supports the **FocusControl** by checking the [**Supported**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn297785) property.

trans-unit.source: The [**ManipulationDelta.Scale**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br242016) value represents the change in scale of the pinch gesture such that a small increase in the size of the pinch is a number slightly larger than 1.0 and a small decrease in the pinch size is a number slightly smaller than 1.0.
trans-unit.target: The [**ManipulationDelta.Scale**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br242016) value represents the change in scale of the pinch gesture such that a small increase in the size of the pinch is a number slightly larger than 1.0 and a small decrease in the pinch size is a number slightly smaller than 1.0.

trans-unit.target: In this example, the current value of the zoom control is multiplied by the scale delta.

trans-unit.source: Before setting the zoom factor, you must make sure that the value is not less than the minimum value supported by the device as indicated by the [**ZoomControl.Min**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn633817) property.
trans-unit.target: Before setting the zoom factor, you must make sure that the value is not less than the minimum value supported by the device as indicated by the [**ZoomControl.Min**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn633817) property.

trans-unit.target: Also, make sure that the value is less than or equal to the [**ZoomControl.Max**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn608150) value.
